overview: Once known as a Polish Catholic town, Hamtramck, MI is now home to America’s first Muslim-majority city. As election season approaches, candidates set out to win hearts, minds and votes in this rapidly changing city. Going behind the scenes of small-town politics, HAMTRAMCK, USA explores the beauty and challenges that come with multiculturalism.
tagline: Hamtramck, USA is a documentary film exploring life and democracy in America's first Muslim majority city.
title: Hamtramck, USA
